org.interreg.docexplore.manuscript
Class ManuscriptLink

java.lang.Object
  org.interreg.docexplore.manuscript.ManuscriptLink
Direct Known Subclasses:
DocExploreDataLink
public class ManuscriptLink
extends java.lang.Object

The high-level interface with the persistence layer for manuscripts which wraps around a DataLink, the low-level interface.

Author:
Alexander Burnett
